snippet.title: Mindustry Touch Screen with Clickable Checkboxes! #mindustry #AdvancedLogic
snippet.description:
draw clear 0 0 0 0 0 0

# Get Touch
radar player any any distance @this 1 player
sensor shootx player @shootX
sensor shooty player @shootY
sensor shooting player @shooting
read a cell1 0
op notEqual b a 1
op and onshoot shooting b
write shooting cell1 0
sensor displayx display1 @x
sensor displayy display1 @y
op sub tx shootx displayx
op sub ty shooty displayy
op mul tx tx 29.33
op mul ty ty 29.33
op add tx tx 88
op add ty ty 88
op mul shooting shooting 255

# Checkbox
set btnx 40
set btny 100
set btnw 20
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd onshoot
jump 36 notEqual abcds 1
read ar cell1 1
op notEqual bw ar 1
write bw cell1 1
op mul btnc ar 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 0 255 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
control enabled conveyor1 ar 0 0 0

# Checkbox
set btnx 100
set btny 100
set btnw 20
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd onshoot
jump 59 notEqual abcds 1
read arr cell1 2
op notEqual bww arr 1
write bww cell1 2
op mul btnc arr 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 0 255 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
control enabled conveyor2 arr 0 0 0

# Checkbox
set btnx 100
set btny 40
set btnw 20
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd onshoot
jump 82 notEqual abcds 1
read arrr cell1 3
op notEqual bwww arrr 1
write bw cell1 3
op mul btnc arrr 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 0 255 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
control enabled conveyor3 arrr 0 0 0

# Checkbox
set btnx 40
set btny 40
set btnw 20
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd onshoot
jump 105 notEqual abcds 1
read arrrr cell1 4
op notEqual bwwwww arrrr 1
write bwwww cell1 4
op mul btnc arrrr 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 0 255 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
control enabled conveyor4 arrrr 0 0 0

draw color 255 255 255 shooting 0 0
draw poly tx ty 3 5 0 0

drawflush display1

snippet.title: Mindustry Touch Screen with Clickable Buttons! #mindustry #AdvancedLogic
snippet.description:
draw clear 0 0 0 0 0 0

# Get Touch
radar player any any distance @this 1 player
sensor shootx player @shootX
sensor shooty player @shootY
sensor shooting player @shooting
sensor displayx display1 @x
sensor displayy display1 @y
op sub tx shootx displayx
op sub ty shooty displayy
op mul tx tx 29.33
op mul ty ty 29.33
op add tx tx 88
op add ty ty 88
op mul shooting shooting 255

# Button
set btnx 100
set btny 100
set btnw 50
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd shooting
op mul btnc abcds 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 0 255 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
control enabled conveyor1 abcds 0 0 0

# Button
set btnx 40
set btny 100
set btnw 50
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd shooting
op mul btnc abcds 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 0 255 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
control enabled conveyor2 abcds 0 0 0

# Button
set btnx 100
set btny 40
set btnw 50
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd shooting
op mul btnc abcds 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 255 0 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
op notEqual e abcds 1
control enabled conveyor3 e 0 0 0

# Button
set btnx 40
set btny 40
set btnw 50
set btnh 20
op add btnxw btnx btnw
op add btnyh btny btnh
op greaterThanEq a tx btnx
op lessThanEq b tx btnxw
op greaterThanEq c ty btny
op lessThanEq d ty btnyh
op and ab a b
op and cd c d
op and abcd ab cd
op and abcds abcd shooting
op mul btnc abcds 155
op add btnc btnc 100
draw color 255 0 0 btnc 0 0
draw rect btnx btny btnw btnh 0 0
op notEqual e abcds 1
control enabled conveyor4 e 0 0 0

draw color 255 255 255 shooting 0 0
draw poly tx ty 3 5 0 0

drawflush display1
